name: ViewTemplate
summary: Template that represents a view subcomponent of an ItemTemplate.

properties.name: bindId
properties.summary: View's ID (or set of IDs) used for data binding. This value must be unique.

properties.name: childTemplates
properties.summary: Contains an array of subview templates to be added (in order) as children to this view.

properties.name: events
properties.summary: Contains key-value pairs of view events and their listeners that are applied to this view component.
properties.description: Array values are considered as multiple event listeners for that event.

properties.name: properties
properties.summary: Contains key-value pairs of view properties and their values that are applied to this view component.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Only the following view classes are supported:

  • Titanium.UI.ActivityIndicator
  • Titanium.UI.Button
  • Titanium.UI.ButtonBar
  • Titanium.UI.ImageView
  • Titanium.UI.Label
  • Titanium.UI.MaskedImage
  • Titanium.UI.ProgressBar
  • Titanium.UI.Picker
  • Titanium.UI.ScrollableView
  • Titanium.UI.Slider
  • Titanium.UI.Switch
  • Titanium.UI.TextArea
  • Titanium.UI.TextField
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.BlurView
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.LivePhotoView
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.Stepper
  • Titanium.UI.iOS.TabbedBar
